Title: AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE ABOLITION OF THE ROAD TAX.
Data:
[ Commonwealth Act No. 255, March 09, 1938 ]
AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE ABOLITION OF THE ROAD TAX.
Be it enacted by the National Assembly of the Philippines:
Section 1. The road tax imposed by section twenty-one hundred and fifty-eight of the Administrative Code is abolished, and all delinquencies by reason thereof are condoned.(aw√ûhi(
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved, March 9, 1938.
